title: Romantic Adults-Only Caribbean Island Escape with All-Inclusive Dining & Drinks
description: Fall in love all over again at the adults-only Galley Bay Resort & Spa, surrounded by lush greenery, white sands and the sparkling waters of the Caribbean. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Best of the Best 2022 award, ranking it among the top 1% of properties, the secluded resort offers all-inclusive dining and free-flow alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks at exquisite open-air restaurants and authentic beachfront bars. Embrace the Caribbean spirit with evening island-inspired live music and weekly barbecue nights, along with plenty of opportunities to explore the spectacular islands and nearby villages. Designed with rustic beach décor, the resort is also home to a stunning range of modern facilities, including a world-class spa, tennis court and a lagoon-style waterfall swimming pool.
offer_address: Five Islands Village, St John’s, Antigua and Barbuda
